tuning.description: Concurrent connections that filter will allow to pass through.

If the No. of entries will increased from the digit mentioned in gc_thresh1 file the garbage collector will run after the time interval mentioned in gc_interval file. This value called soft maximum value.
If the No. of entries will increased from the digit mentioned in gc_thresh2 file, the garbage collector will run immediately. This value called hard maximum value.
Is the maximum No. of ARP entries which can be kept in table.

rules.description: Special routing table containing high priority control routers for local and broadcast addresses.
The normal routing table containing all non-policy routes.
Reserved for post-processing if no previous default rules selected the packet.
